languages.text: "Люди всю жизнь ищут ответы на эти вопросы. И зачастую умирают, так и не найдя их".
"People spend their whole lives searching for the answers to these questions, and they often die without finding them."
languages.original_text: "Люди всю жизнь ищут ответы на эти вопросы. И зачастую умирают, так и не найдя их".

traits.locale_text: "People spend their entire lives searching for the answers to these questions. Most of them die before they can find them."
"People spend their entire lives searching for the answers to these questions. Most of them die before they can find them."
"People spend their whole lives searching for the answers to these questions, and they often die without finding them."
"People spend their whole lives searching for the answers to these questions, and they often die without finding them."
"People spend their whole lives searching for the answers to these questions, and they often die without finding them."
"People spend their whole lives searching for the answers to these questions, and they often die without finding them."

languages.text: «La gente se pasa la vida buscando respuestas a esas preguntas, y a menudo mueren sin haberlas encontrado».
languages.original_text: "People spend their whole lives searching for the answers to these questions, and they often die without finding them."

traits.locale_text: «La gente se pasa la vida buscando respuestas a esas preguntas, y a menudo mueren sin haberlas encontrado».

languages.text: 「人々はその質問への答えを探すために一生を費やし、多くの者は見つけられずに死んでいく」
languages.original_text: "People spend their whole lives searching for the answers to these questions, and they often die without finding them."

traits.locale_text: 「人々はその質問への答えを探すために一生を費やし、多くの者は見つけられずに死んでいく」

languages.text: “人们终其一生都在寻找这些问题的答案，但往往却至死都无法寻得。”
languages.original_text: "People spend their whole lives searching for the answers to these questions, and they often die without finding them."

traits.locale_text: “人们终其一生都在寻找这些问题的答案，但往往却至死都无法寻得。”

languages.text: "Viele verbringen ihr ganzes Leben auf der Suche nach Antworten auf diese Fragen und sterben häufig, ohne sie gefunden zu haben."
languages.original_text: "People spend their whole lives searching for the answers to these questions, and they often die without finding them."

traits.locale_text: "Viele verbringen ihr ganzes Leben auf der Suche nach Antworten auf diese Fragen und sterben häufig, ohne sie gefunden zu haben."

languages.text: « Les gens passent leur vie à chercher les réponses à ces questions, et bien souvent, ils meurent sans les avoir trouvées. »
languages.original_text: "People spend their whole lives searching for the answers to these questions, and they often die without finding them."

traits.locale_text: « Les gens passent leur vie à chercher les réponses à ces questions, et bien souvent, ils meurent sans les avoir trouvées. »
